overview: For the first time in history of cinema, the immortal work created by Shakespeare in the 16th century, is shot by Samsung Galaxy phone. The action takes place in the 21st century. The text is unchanged, translation of Ivane Machabeli. Political-criminal drama. The centuries pass but does not change dishonest aspiration to power.  Cain’s sin is deep-rooted in the high rank of government. Hamlet is investigating the death of his father’s sudden death.
title: Hamlet
